text.tspan: Directions to the Temple
via South I-675
Take exit 2B onto Jefferson Avenue, turn
right onto Johnson Street, then left onto
North Washington Avenue.
via North I-675
Take exit 2 toward M-13/5th Avenue and
continue as it becomes Wadsworth Avenue
for about three quarter miles, then turn
left onto North Washington Avenue.
Parking
is available behind the Temple Theatre.
We have permission to use any empty
spots, including those marked as reserved.
Please Enter
via the red carpet entrance on Washington
Avenue. The ceremony will be at five o'clock
on the second floor, with hors d'oeuvres to
follow in the first floor lounge. The reception
will be on the third floor in the Grand
Ballroom at six-thirty.
Accommodations
are available at the Ramada Saginaw Hotel
and Suites if you'd like to stay in town after
the wedding. To confirm your reservation,
please call the hotel by November 21st at
(800) 654-3309 and mention that you're with
the Hanson or Chrysler party.
More Information
is available online at theknot.com/wedding/Hanson-and-Chrysler
Please indicate guests in attendance
and their choices of Beef Jardiniere,
Balsamic Chicken, Butternut Ravioli, or
Chicken Fingers, for children under 12.
Directions to the Temple
via South I-675
Take exit 2B onto Jefferson Avenue, turn
right onto Johnson Street, then left onto
North Washington Avenue.
via North I-675
Take exit 2 toward M-13/5th Avenue and
continue as it becomes Wadsworth Avenue
for about three quarter miles, then turn
left onto North Washington Avenue.
Parking
is available behind the Temple Theatre.
We have permission to use any empty
spots, including those marked as reserved.
Please Enter
via the red carpet entrance on Washington
Avenue. The ceremony will be at five o'clock
on the second floor, with hors d'oeuvres to
follow in the first floor lounge. The reception
will be on the third floor in the Grand
Ballroom at six-thirty.
Accommodations

and Suites if you'd like to stay in town after

please call the hotel by November 21st at
(800) 654-3309 and mention that you're with

Please indicate guests in attendance
and their choices of Beef Jardiniere,
Balsamic Chicken, Butternut Ravioli, or
Chicken Fingers, for children under 12.

Take exit 2B onto Jefferson Avenue, turn
right onto Johnson Street, then left onto
North Washington Avenue.

left onto North Washington Avenue.
Parking

We have permission to use any empty

Please Enter
